body:
Comment 2: 
It is not just PtrTo() it also fails on line 99 with value.Addr().
Line 92 and 99 try to do the same thing different ways and both fail only on Z.F 
if you uncomment lines 103-109  they both start working properly. If you add something
after the array in F it also works, which is what G is.
F is exactly the same layout as C which never fails.

I would guess it is a compiler bug in the generated type tables.
That is a guess though.
